#### Intune device configuration service limits

| Request type | Limit per tenant for all apps | Limit per app per tenant |
| ------------ | ----------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH | 200 requests per 20 seconds | 100 requests per 20 seconds |
| Any | 2000 requests per 20 seconds | 1000 requests per 20 seconds |

The preceding limits apply to the following resources:  
advancedThreatProtectionOnboardingDeviceSettingState, advancedThreatProtectionOnboardingStateSummary, androidCertificateProfileBase, androidCompliancePolicy, androidCustomConfiguration,
